text: @realDonaldTrump Why?  Do you know anything about him?  Meanwhile, both you and Mike Pence have been exposed to Covid-19 by close aides.  Are you going to be honest about it if either of you test positive? BTW, if you both become disabled at the same time, your best bud Nancy Pelosi takes charge.
